languages.text: "Единственная польза от вас, мон-кай — ваше умение страдать. Боль физическая меня давно пресытила — твои сородичи щедро делятся ей в своих клетях в Комморре. Боль души, с другой стороны... редкое наслаждение. В конце концов, должен же я был воздать тебе за те неприятности, что ты мне доставил{mf||а}".

"The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long been surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."
languages.original_text: "Единственная польза от вас, мон-кай — ваше умение страдать. Боль физическая меня давно пресытила — твои сородичи щедро делятся ей в своих клетях в Комморре. Боль души, с другой стороны... редкое наслаждение. В конце концов, должен же я был воздать тебе за те неприятности, что ты мне доставил{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long grown surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. Ultimately, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. Ultimately, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前の種族が得意とすることは苦しむことだけだ。俺は長い間、肉体的な痛みに飢えていた。お前の種はコモラフの檻からそれを余すことなく提供してくれる。だが、魂の痛みは…稀に見る喜びだ。それに、お前が起こした問題をの礼をきっちり返す必要があったからな」
languages.original_text: "The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long been surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前の種族が得意とすることは苦しむことだけだ。俺は長い間、肉体的な痛みに飢えていた。お前の種はコモラフの檻からそれを余すことなく提供してくれる。だが、魂の痛みは…稀に見る喜びだ。それに、お前が起こした問題をの礼をきっちり返す必要があったからな」

languages.text: “你的族群只擅长一件事情，猴子，那就是受苦。你那些被关押在科摩罗囚笼中的同类，为我带来了充分的肉体痛苦，而我已经对此感到厌倦。不过，灵魂上的痛苦……则是难得一见的享受。毕竟，你给我带来了那么多麻烦，也该补偿补偿我了。”
languages.original_text: "The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long been surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

traits.locale_text: “你的族群只擅长一件事情，猴子，那就是受苦。你那些被关押在科摩罗囚笼中的同类，为我带来了充分的肉体痛苦，而我已经对此感到厌倦。不过，灵魂上的痛苦……则是难得一见的享受。毕竟，你给我带来了那么多麻烦，也该补偿补偿我了。”

languages.text: «Lo único para lo que tu gente sirve, mon-keigh, es para sufrir. Ya estoy más que satisfecho con el dolor físico. Tus congéneres lo aportan de forma abundante en sus jaulas en Commorragh. Sin embargo, el dolor del alma... es una delicia escasa. A fin de cuentas, tenía que recompensarte por todas las molestias que me has causado».
languages.original_text: "The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long been surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

traits.locale_text: «Lo único para lo que tu gente sirve, mon-keigh, es para sufrir. Ya estoy más que satisfecho con el dolor físico. Tus congéneres lo aportan de forma abundante en sus jaulas en Commorragh. Sin embargo, el dolor del alma... es una delicia escasa. A fin de cuentas, tenía que recompensarte por todas las molestias que me has causado».

languages.text: « Votre espèce n'est bonne qu'à une chose, mon-keigh : souffrir. Cela fait bien longtemps que je suis las de la douleur physique : vos semblables emprisonnés à Commorragh en produisent en abondance. La douleur de l'âme, cependant... est un délice bien plus subtil. Et puis je me devais de vous récompenser pour tous les soucis que vous m'avez causés. »
languages.original_text: "The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long been surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

traits.locale_text: « Votre espèce n'est bonne qu'à une chose, mon-keigh : souffrir. Cela fait bien longtemps que je suis las de la douleur physique : vos semblables emprisonnés à Commorragh en produisent en abondance. La douleur de l'âme, cependant... est un délice bien plus subtil. Et puis je me devais de vous récompenser pour tous les soucis que vous m'avez causés. »

languages.text: "Die einzige Sache, für die Euresgleichen gut ist, Chem-Pan-Sey, ist Eure Leidensfähigkeit. Ich bin längst über körperlichen Schmerz hinweg – den erleidet Euresgleichen in den Käfigen von Commorragh im Übermaß. Der Schmerz der Seele hingegen ... ist ein seltener Genuss. Schließlich müsste ich den Ärger, den Ihr mir bereitet habt, ja irgendwie zurückgeben."
languages.original_text: "The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long been surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

traits.locale_text: "Die einzige Sache, für die Euresgleichen gut ist, Chem-Pan-Sey, ist Eure Leidensfähigkeit. Ich bin längst über körperlichen Schmerz hinweg – den erleidet Euresgleichen in den Käfigen von Commorragh im Übermaß. Der Schmerz der Seele hingegen ... ist ein seltener Genuss. Schließlich müsste ich den Ärger, den Ihr mir bereitet habt, ja irgendwie zurückgeben."

languages.text: "Senin türünün tek işlevi, acı çekmektir mon-keigh. Bedenî acıya uzun bir müddettir tokum. Soydaşların sağ olsun, Commorragh'taki kafeslerinde bolca doyurdular. Ruhun çektiği acıysa... Bana bambaşka bir zevk veriyor. Ne de olsa başıma açtığın onca sorunun karşılığını vermem gerekirdi."
languages.original_text: "The sole thing that your kind is good for, mon-keigh, is your ability to suffer. I have long been surfeited with physical pain — your kin provide it in abundance from their cages in Commorragh. The pain of the soul, on the other hand... is a rare delight. After all, I had to recompense you for all the trouble you have caused me."

traits.locale_text: "Senin türünün tek işlevi acı çekmektir mon-keigh. Bedenî acıya uzun bir müddettir tokum. Soydaşların, Commorragh’taki kafeslerinde ondan bolca sağlıyorlar. Ruhun çektiği acıysa... Başka bir zevk veriyor bana. Ne de olsa benim başıma açtığın onca işin karşılığını vermem gerekirdi."
